pageContext.claim: “They talk about witness tampering [in Roger Stone’s indictment]. But the man that he was tampering didn't seem to have much of a problem with it.”
pageContext.analysis: In a text message to a radio host and associate of his, Randy Credico, Stone wrote: “You are a rat. A stoolie. You backstab your friends-run your mouth my lawyers are dying Rip you to shreds.” Stone threatened to take Credico's dog and warned him not to testify to Congress about the Trump campaign and Wikileaks. Credico decided not to testify to Congress, though he later talked to the FBI.
